feature_description: Validate bank account information promptly and precisely to confirm authenticity.
title: Bank Verification

feature_description: A penniless verification process that validates bank accounts without needing any money.
title: Bank Verification Pennyless

feature_description: Fetches linked bank account details using a mobile number
title: Mobile To Bank

feature_description: Reverse Penny Drop verifies bank account ownership by generating a UPI request. When the user interacts with the link, their account details are validated instantly without any debit.
title: Reverse Penny Drop Initialize

feature_description: Checks the current verification status of a Reverse Penny Drop request.
title: Reverse Penny Drop Status

feature_description: Details of the user's present job role, employer, employment type, and duration of service
title: Current Employment Details

feature_description: Retrieves an individual’s employment history using UAN, including employer names, joining and exit dates, and member details.
title: Employment History

feature_description: Fetches an individual’s complete employment history linked to a UAN, including employer names and joining/exit dates.
title: Employment History UAN

feature_description: Fetches detailed EPF passbook information including UAN-based employee profile, employers’ contribution history, personal details, and service records without OTP verification.
title: EPFO Advanced Details

feature_description: This API retrieves Universal Account Numbers (UAN) linked to a mobile number by validating against EPFO and employment registry data sources.
title: Mobile to UAN

feature_description: Retrieves a user’s CIBIL credit score and detailed report using their PAN and mobile number
title: Credit Report CIBIL

feature_description: Fetches a comprehensive CRIF credit report, including credit score, loan accounts, inquiry history, and personal details, for financial risk assessment and lending decisions.
title: Credit Report Crif

feature_description: Fetches a complete Experian credit report and score, including personal details, account history, inquiries, employment info, and derived credit attributes.
title: Credit Report Experian

feature_description: Validates the client’s ITR credentials and confirms whether the account is active and accessible.
title: ITR Check Credentials

feature_description: Provides PAN-based compliance details including Aadhaar link, PAN status, and 206AB classification
title: ITR Compliance

feature_description: Fetches the client's 26AS details across assessment years and provides secure download links for each TDS record.
title: ITR Download 26AS

feature_description: Downloads the AIS report for a user by financial year, returning both JSON data and downloadable file links.
title: ITR Download AIS V2

feature_description: This API endpoint retrieves detailed ITR information for a client, including filing history, status, and document links.
title: ITR Download

feature_description: Retrieves the client’s ITR filing history and provides secure downloadable ITR-V documents for each assessment year
title: ITR File Download V

feature_description: Initiates the ITR password reset process by sending an OTP to the registered contact.
title: ITR Forgot Password

feature_description: Fetches Form 26AS details, including assessment year–wise TDS information from deductors, for income tax verification and financial compliance.
title: ITR Get 26as Details

feature_description: Retrieves the taxpayer’s AIS report for the selected financial year along with download details.
title: ITR Get AIS

feature_description: Fetches a taxpayer’s ITR details, including personal info, income summary, and raw ITR data
title: ITR Get ITR Details

feature_description: Fetches the taxpayer’s profile details, including PAN info, contact details, address, and jurisdiction, using the client ID.
title: ITR Get Profile Details

feature_description: Generates a unique client ID to initiate the ITR filing workflow.
title: ITR Create Client ID

feature_description: Verifies the submitted OTP and completes the ITR password reset process
title: ITR Submit OTP

feature_description: This API retrieves GST identification numbers linked to a given mobile number by validating records across government and financial registration databases.
title: Mobile to GST

feature_description: Retrieves a user’s estimated spending propensity (e.g., Low/Medium/High) based on the provided mobile number.
title: Mobile To Spend Propensity

feature_description: Fetches SEBI and NSE regulatory records for a given PAN.
title: Sebi Records

feature_description: Securely downloads Aadhaar details from DigiLocker using a client_id
title: Digilocker Download Aadhaar

feature_description: Provides real-time status of the DigiLocker authentication flow for a specific client.
title: Digilocker Status

feature_description: Initiates secure DigiLocker document access through an OAuth URL.
title: Digilocker Via Link

feature_description: Retrieves authenticated driving license information based on DL number and date of birth.
title: Driving License

feature_description: Verifies farmer identity and registration status using Aadhaar and state code
title: Farmer Verification

feature_description: Maps a FASTag ID to the associated vehicle RC and returns FASTag status and vehicle details.
title: Fastag To RC

feature_description: This API retrieves address details linked to a mobile number by aggregating records from telecom, utility, and financial data sources.
title: Mobile to Address

feature_description: Fetches LPG connection details such as gas provider, consumer information, distributor details, and address using a registered mobile number.
title: Mobile to LPG

feature_description: This API retrieves the registered full name associated with a given mobile number using telecom and banking-grade verification sources.
title: Mobile to Name

feature_description: This API retrieves the PAN number associated with a given mobile number and name by validating against trusted telecom and financial data sources.
title: Mobile to PAN

feature_description: This API retrieves vehicle registration numbers associated with a given mobile number by validating against transport and insurance-linked databases.
title: Mobile to RC

feature_description: Maps a mobile number to its associated UPI VPA and account holder name for quick identity verification.
title: Mobile to VPA

feature_description: This API retrieves extensive data linked to an individual's PAN card.
title: PAN Comprehensive

feature_description: Verifies PAN details against official records and returns masked personal information such as name, DOB, address, and linkage status.
title: PAN Verification

feature_description: Retrieves verified passport holder details using passport number and date of birth for identity verification.
title: Passport Verification

feature_description: Fetches ration card details from the central/state portal using the ration number, including household members, scheme, and distribution information.
title: Ration Card Details

feature_description: The RC Full API provides complete vehicle registration details.
title: Vehicle RC

feature_description: Fetches LPG connection details such as gas provider, consumer information, distributor details, and address using a registered mobile number.
title: Mobile to LPG

feature_description: This API enables access to all essential details of an Indian Voter ID card.
title: Voter Id Verification

feature_description: Finds GSTINs linked to a business name across different states.
title: GSTIN By Name

feature_description: Retrieves all GSTINs associated with a PAN along with their state and status.
title: GSTIN By Pan

feature_description: This API allows users to verify a GST number and retrieve essential details of businesses registered under India’s Goods and Services Tax system.
title: GST Verification

feature_description: The GSTIN Advanced API delivers enhanced GSTIN verification with detailed business, compliance, promoter, turnover, and e-invoice information.
title: GST Advanced

feature_description: Fetches basic exporter and firm details using the IEC number.
title: IEC Advanced

feature_description: Maps a given mobile number to associated Importer Exporter Code (IEC) details for merchant verification and trade profiling.
title: Mobile To IEC

feature_description: This API retrieves MSME (Udyam) registration details associated with a mobile number by validating against official government and business registry data sources.
title: Mobile to MSME

feature_description: Prefills customer KYC details such as name, contact information, addresses, identity data, and demographic attributes using a given mobile number.
title: Mobile To Prefill

feature_description: Verifies MSME (Udyam) registration details using the Udyam ID and returns official enterprise, classification, and address information.
title: MSME Verification

feature_description: Complete identity, financial, and business insights using just a mobile number.
title: Mobile 360 Profile

feature_description: Checks whether a mobile number is revoked under the MNRL database.
title: MNRL Check

feature_description: Fetches vehicle registration (RC) details using a chassis number for accurate vehicle identification and verification.
title: Chassis To RC

feature_description: Accurately extracts Aadhaar number, name, date of birth, gender, and address from Aadhaar cards using OCR for fast and secure identity verification
title: OCR Aadhaar

feature_description: Reads a Driving License image and returns essential holder and license details automatically.
title: OCR DL

feature_description: Compares two facial images to verify identity by measuring facial similarity with high accuracy.
title: Face Match

feature_description: Automatically extracts PAN number, name, date of birth, and other key details from PAN cards using OCR for instant identity verification
title: OCR PAN

feature_description: Extracts key passport details from uploaded passport images using OCR, including personal information, address, and document metadata.
title: OCR Passport

feature_description: Extracts vehicle RC details via OCR, including registration, owner information, vehicle identifiers, fuel type, and validity dates.
title: OCR RC

feature_description: Extracts voter ID details from uploaded voter ID images using OCR, including name, date of birth, gender, address, and voter ID number.
title: OCR Voter Id
